response.plan:
You think that community_1 (longxing) has already been chosen by others, so it may not be available for you to rent. As for community_5 (sanhejiayuan), community_3 (ronghui), and community_4 (wankecheng), you don't have enough information to form an opinion about them yet.

For now, you want to publish information honestly online: No.

The reason why you don't want to publish information honestly online is because you are in a competitive relationship with your acquaintances. If they see the information you publish, they might try to rent the same house, reducing your chances of getting it.

Your current plan is to only share limited information online, such as the general location and rent budget, without disclosing specific community names. This way, you can attract potential landlords or agents while keeping your options open and not giving away too much information to your acquaintances.
